name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-language-detection
title: Language Detection Prompt
shortDescription: This prompt will extract the language used in a block of text
longDescription: This prompt will extract the language used in a block of text

metadata.value: Please identify the predominant language of this text [text]. The detected language should be returned as the 'script' of the language. For instance, for the phrase 'I have a dog', it will return 'en' instead of 'en-US'. The response for languages that can't be detected is unknown. Only return the language, do not say anything else.
